Package rayrangers.raytracer.math

Class Vector3D

java.lang.Object
rayrangers.raytracer.math.Vector3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformable
public class Vector3D extends Object implements Transformable
Represents a vector in 3D space.

    • normalize

      public Vector3D normalize()
      Normalizes this vector, returning a new vector with the same direction but a length (magnitude) of 1.
      Returns:
      A new Vector3D instance representing the normalized vector.
      Throws:
      ArithmeticException - If the vector has a length of 0, as normalization is undefined.
